trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Riqi-Mao is anything but calm.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the amaro handler.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_TODO_01<tab>Use the whittled whistle to search for the amaro.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the amaro handler.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_TODO_03<tab>Report to Riqi-Mao.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_000<tab>You there! Get ready to run! Time is of the essence!

TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_001<tab>Our new amaro has escaped into the forest! The carnivorous-beast-and-bandit-filled forest! Wicked white, my contacts at the Crystarium told me it was meant to be <var 1A 02 /var>trained<var 1A 01 /var>...

TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_002<tab>Anyway, we need as many people as possible out there looking for it. Its handler is leading the search─as he <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var>─in the Forest of the Lost Shepherd. Go, go!
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_003<tab>Why are you still standing here!? Run, run!
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_010<tab>You've come to aid in the search? Excellent.

TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_011<tab>It's this amaro's first time out of the Crystarium, and he got a bit spooked. Took off before I could stop him─it's instinctual, you understand. He should still respond to this, though.

TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_012<tab>That whistle produces a tone that all of our amaro have been trained since birth to react to. Blow it loudly, and then listen for his cry. If he's nearby, you'll know.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_013<tab>It's possible that he will be too skittish to follow you back. If so, please return here and let me know.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_AMARO03382_100_020<tab>(-Immobile Amaro-)Gwee...
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The amaro gives a weak cry at the sound of the whistle, turning his eyes in your direction. Perhaps he will respond to you, if you speak to him soothingly...
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_AMARO03382_100_021<tab>(-Immobile Amaro-)Gwee...
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>You hear the faint cry of an amaro. He must be nearby.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>You hear nothing in reply to the shrill tone of the whistle.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>The amaro trembles, apparently unable to move due to injury, fear, or both. Hopefully his handler will know what to do.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_100_030<tab>You're back already? Does that mean you found him?
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_030<tab>He can't move!? Poor thing! I must go to him at once!
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_035<tab>There, there. You'll be alright.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_AMARO03382_100_036<tab>Gwee!
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>The amaro's eyes are filled with something like gratitude as it looks toward you.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_040<tab>If you're back, it had better be because you found the amaro...
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_041<tab>Oh, you did! In that case─thank you. We really couldn't have afforded to lose such a valuable resource.
